name: Esophagus Sarcophagus
description:
This is a prototype to explore the idea of being on the other end of a breakout game. I am still exploring the gameplay and will likely settle on a couple different modes, but right now you are scored on how many blocks of yourself you can digest as you plummet through an esophagus on your way to the stomach.

You are first tasked with building a loadout for your sarcophagus. There are some requirements as this is a game where you try to destroy yourself, but there is a balance between mobility and firepower.

This is a game for Wizard Jam 8!
